forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Recent posts JS for more boards

comments.text: Hi! The back end service used by in.anyland.com already delivers recent event board posts...
... and as of today, it also shows the following fields for more boards: recentHelpPosts, recentUpdatePosts, recentQuestPosts, recentSuggestionsPosts + recentFeedPosts.
Please find out more background on the Steam forum. Thx Flarn!
ps: this is the new [board: feed] board for your experiments with this feature.

thread.latestCommentText: ps: this is the new [board: feed] board for your experiments with this feature.
